storror

what is storror ?

put your stores online withour any hassle and expand your customer base with the internet or maybe you just want to see if your favourite store's status then storror it is

live status

as a customer you can check whether a store is open or not in real time.if you are a vendor youcan change the status of your store at the click of a button

votes

as a customer you can upvote or downote the store that isn't showing correct status along with reviews for others to see. as a vendor you can check the reviews.

reviews

interact with your customer via comments and give your feedback to the concered vendor

menus

check if your favourite dish is availabe or not or proudly flaunt your menu item on your stores menu as a vendor

get started
